long_description: Save yourself from the sun this summer with the REI Sahara Outback Cape hat. Wide brim and stowable rear neck cape offer excellent coverage in sunny climates; cape rolls up and stows under the brim when not in use. Nylon fabric provides UPF 50+ protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. CoolMax(R) polyester headband wicks moisture away from your brow and speeds the evaporation process. Chin strap adjusts with toggle to keep hat on in windy conditions. Foam brim will float in water.
short_description: Save yourself from the sun this summer with the REI Sahara Outback Cape hat.
